briefTitle: A Trial to Explore the Tolerability, Safety and Efficacy of Paliperidone Extended Release in Patients With Schizophrenia
officialTitle: An Open-Label Prospective Trial to Explore the Tolerability, Safety and Efficacy of Flexibly-Dosed Paliperidone ER Among Treatment-Na√Øve and Newly Diagnosed Patients With Schizophrenia
summary: The purpose of this study is to explore the tolerability, safety and efficacy of flexibly dosed paliperidone extended release (ER) among patients with schizophrenia.

primaryOutcome.measure: The Proportion of Patients Improving 20% in Total Positive and Negative Syndrome Scale (PANSS) at Endpoint (Day 90)
